proxy_interval.description: Minimum number of seconds that must pass before using proxy again

blacklist_threshold.description: Number of bad requests before proxy is put into blacklisted state

blacklist_time.description: Amount of time proxy must stay in blacklisted state

max_blacklist_count.description: Max number of times a proxy can enter blacklist state before it is permanently blacklisted

designated_endpoint.description: A designated test endpoint which does not blacklist any requests.

seed_queue.description: Reserved queue id which is used only for the designated endpoint

aggregate_queue.description: Reserved queue id that aggregates all proxy detail records for all queues except the seed

seed_frequency.description: Percent/probability for when to use a new seed proxy

retry_inactive_frequency.description: Percent/probability for when to use an unblacklisted, inactive proxy (sum of this and seed_frequency should not exceed 1)

sync_interval.description: How many seconds between syncing cache with database

database_credential_file.description: filename of json file containing postgres database credentials

redis_credential_file.description: filename of json file containing redis credentials

overrides.description: Override any config settings above only for specific queues
